INDEPENDENT-No help or oversight -OR- Help/oversight provided only 1 or 2 times during last 7 days
SUPERVISION-Oversight, encouragement or cueing provided 3 or more times during last7 days -OR- Supervision (3 or more times) plus physical assistance provided only 1 or 2 times during last 7 days

LIMITED ASSISTANCE-Resident highly involved in activity; received physical help in guided manoeuvring of limbs or other non-weight bearing assistance 3 or more times - OR-More help provided only 1 or 2 times during last 7 days

EXTENSIVE ASSISTANCE-While resident performed part of activity, over last 7-day period, help of following type(s) provided 3 or more times: - Weight-bearing support - Full staff performance during part (but not all) of last 7 days
TOTAL DEPENDENCE-Full staff performance of activity during entire 7 days
ACTIVITY DID NOT OCCUR during entire 7 days
IV Fluid and Support/Perfusions et autres mesures intraveineuses
Life Support/Mesures de maintient en vie
Transfusion of blood product/Transfusion de produits sanguins
No Significant Medical History/Pas d´antécédents médicaux pertinents
No current problems or disability/Patient n´a pas de problèmes actuels
Past Medical History unknown/Pas d´antécédents connus
Family History Unknown/Aucun antécédent familial connu
Substance Type Unknown/Le patient présente une allergie/intolérance à une substance inconnue.
No Known Drug Allergies/Aucune intolérance à des médicaments connue
